name: Sandwich Drop
description:
Move with W/A/S/D or Arrow keys

Jump with SPACE and hold SPACE down to jump higher

The sandwiches need to land on the cart in order to be stacked. If they land on the player they go splat.

Have fun.

Update 1: Changed percent requirement on level 3 to 75% from 90%

Update2: Made platforming on level 2 easier, and added a sentence to the dialogue on level 4.
